name: @lucyus/actionify
description: Actionify is a lightweight Node.js automation library for Windows, enabling seamless control of the mouse, keyboard, clipboard, screen, windows and sound, with additional features like OCR and more.

scripts.build: npm run clean && node-gyp configure && node-gyp rebuild && tsc -p . && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && node-gyp configure --release && node-gyp rebuild --release && tsc -p . --sourceMap false --declarationMap false && npm run copy:assets
scripts.release:major: bash -c "version=$(npm version major --no-git-tag-version) && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m \"[WIP] release(global): release $version\" && git tag \"$version\" && changes=$(npx conventional-changelog -p conventionalcommits -r 2) && changes=$(echo \"$changes\" | sed '1,2d') && npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --amend -m \"release(global): release $version\" -m \"$changes\" && git tag -d \"$version\" && git tag \"$version\" && git push origin master --follow-tags"
scripts.release:minor: bash -c "version=$(npm version minor --no-git-tag-version) && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m \"[WIP] release(global): release $version\" && git tag \"$version\" && changes=$(npx conventional-changelog -p conventionalcommits -r 2) && changes=$(echo \"$changes\" | sed '1,2d') && npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --amend -m \"release(global): release $version\" -m \"$changes\" && git tag -d \"$version\" && git tag \"$version\" && git push origin master --follow-tags"
scripts.release:patch: bash -c "version=$(npm version patch --no-git-tag-version) && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m \"[WIP] release(global): release $version\" && git tag \"$version\" && changes=$(npx conventional-changelog -p conventionalcommits -r 2) && changes=$(echo \"$changes\" | sed '1,2d') && npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --amend -m \"release(global): release $version\" -m \"$changes\" && git tag -d \"$version\" && git tag \"$version\" && git push origin master --follow-tags"
scripts.deploy: npm run build:prod && npm publish --access public
scripts.execute: node -e "const { spawn } = require('child_process'); spawn('node', [process.argv[1].replace('src', 'lib').replace('.ts', '.js')], { stdio: 'inherit', shell: true });"
scripts.build:execute: npm run build && npm run execute
scripts.fastbuild:execute: tsc -p . && npm run copy:assets && npm run execute

author: Lucyus
